author: Atilgan Asikuzun
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 101 – February 2015 Cover Art Lady and the Ship Atilgan Asikuzun was born in Turkey/Istanbul and has been a professional artist since 2006. He currently lives in Istanbul where he works as a freelance and in-house artist. His concept art and matte paintings have been used in the making of three feature films. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Skip to content
Issue 101 – February 2015
Cover Art
Lady and the Ship
Atilgan Asikuzun was born in Turkey/Istanbul and has been a professional artist since 2006. He currently lives in Istanbul where he works as a freelance and in-house artist. His concept art and matte paintings have been used in the making of three feature films.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Lady and the Ship by Atilgan Asikuzun
